Changelog
=========

0.3 - 2011-09-22
----------------

- Removed evil code, replaced with full Plone calendar_macros re-use. This
  makes this widget fully Plone 4 compatible.
  [mj]

0.2 - 2011-08-25
----------------

- Updated distribution metadata / structure and removed unused import.
  [hannosch]

0.1 - 2008-03-04
----------------

- Evil code.
  [wilkes, fschulze]

- Initial package structure.
  [zopeskel]
